about_the_game:
In Chronicles Reborn, journey through a vast open-world as you gather resources, craft weapons, and uncover ancient secrets. As a member of the Brightwyn Order, it’s your duty to recover lost knowledge, rescue imprisoned comrades, and build a legacy in a world filled with peril and wonder.

With survival at its core, your adventure will take you across diverse biomes, each offering unique resources, enemies, and mysteries to uncover. Along the way, build your sanctuary, tame animals, and unlock powerful new abilities to aid in your quest.

SURVIVE AND THRIVE

Gather essential resources from your surroundings to craft weapons, armor, and vital tools. Prepare food, potions, and magical equipment to keep yourself alive as you battle enemies, explore ancient ruins, and solve puzzles to uncover the world’s secrets.

TAME, HUNT, AND RIDE

Track down wild animals for food and materials, or tame them to help with various tasks. Ride your mounts across the vast landscapes, or raise livestock to produce vital resources like milk, eggs, and wool. Each animal you tame can aid in your survival.

EXPLORE AND BUILD

Explore an interconnected world map with unique locations, hidden lore, and secrets to discover. Build and customize your sanctuary, a place to store your treasures and defend against enemies. Personalize your home and craft advanced structures to improve your journey.

MASTER COMBAT AND MAGIC

Choose your combat style—whether wielding swords, maces, or bows, or mastering the arcane with staves and spells. Engage enemies up close or attack from a distance with ranged weapons, adapting your strategies to survive in a dangerous world.



FARM, GROW, AND HARVEST

Cultivate crops to sustain yourself and craft magical items. Use strategic farming techniques to ensure your land remains fertile, and raise livestock to produce essential materials. Grow your resources and build a thriving life amidst the wilds.

UNLOCK LOST KNOWLEDGE

Recover the ancient knowledge hidden throughout the world. Complete quests for NPCs, earn Knowledge Points, and unlock new crafting recipes and abilities. The more knowledge you recover, the more powerful your character becomes.

SINGLE-PLAYER ADVENTURE WITH MULTIPLAYER PLANS

Currently, Chronicles Reborn offers a rich single-player experience. However, we’re planning to expand into multiplayer, allowing you to share your adventures with friends.

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY

Connect with us on Discord to stay updated, share your feedback, and help shape the future of Chronicles Reborn as we continue developing the game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: As a sworn protector of the Brightwyn Order, uncover lost knowledge in a world rich with secrets. Gather resources, master ancient skills, and face formidable foes across diverse biomes. Build, craft, and fight your way through a vast land filled with quests, mysteries, and untold adventures.
